uqa.reading_wiki_dumps module¶

Read and parse wiki tar.bz2 dumps archives.

Notes

This module is not properly integrated with the CLi and the package in general.

uqa.reading_wiki_dumps.wiki_extractor_parser(dir_path: str) → Iterable[Tuple[str, Union[Dict, List]]][source]¶

Explore directory dir_path open archives and yield default formated data.

Parameters

dir_path (str) – The path to the directory to explore. (all files are considered as archives)

Yields

  • str – The extracted data file path

  • dataset.TJson – The formated data in default data format.
